v1.13.0.description: fixes spacing between bottom links and the language selector
fixes an issue where the footer text had the potential to overlap in languages with long words

v1.10.0.description: fixes an issue where the footer was not aligned with the new module padding spec

v1.9.0.description: fixes an issue where relative positioning caused the footer to be misaligned
removes hardcoded string in copyright to json

v1.8.0.description: fixes an issue with line wrapping in universal footer on iPad
fixes column shifting at vp3 to be 3x3
fixes an issue with text wrapping in copyright and region area at smaller breakpoints
fixes an issue with the overall positioning and adds a top margin
